name: Courtesan
flavor: An accomplished manipulator and master of the social arts.

features.name: Searing Glance - Reaction
features.desc: When a PC within Close range makes a Presence Roll, you can mark a Stress to cast a gaze toward the aftermath. On the target’s failure, they must mark 2 Stress and are Vulnerable until the scene ends or they succeed on a social action against the Courtesan. On the target’s success, they must mark a Stress.
